channel.title: Joe Buhlig
channel.description: leverage the digital and welcome real life

item.title: 6: The Bacon Stratagem
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Josh finished up one of his goals! And that means this show has a lot of conversation about Ignite Minneapolis.
item.content:encoded: Josh finished up one of his goals! And that means this show has a lot of conversation about Ignite Minneapolis.

item.title: 5: Know Your Stuff
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Ignite time is here and Josh is getting nervous. And Joe will be there to make sure he doesn’t screw it up. But all-in-all their goals on getting back on track.
item.content:encoded: Ignite time is here and Josh is getting nervous. And Joe will be there to make sure he doesn’t screw it up. But all-in-all their goals on getting back on track.

item.title: 26: The Sleep Revolution by Arianna Huffington
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Sleep. A lot goes on when we’re not awake. This round Mike and Joe go through their experiences and struggles with getting rest.
item.content:encoded: Sleep. A lot goes on when we’re not awake. This round Mike and Joe go through their experiences and struggles with getting rest.

item.title: 4: Blame The In-Laws
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: The parenting questions continue while Joe struggles to do anything on his goals and Josh preps for his Ignite talk.
item.content:encoded: The parenting questions continue while Joe struggles to do anything on his goals and Josh preps for his Ignite talk.

item.title: 25: Grit by Angela Duckworth
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Powering through things we don’t want to do. That’s what Angela Duckworth helps us do with this week’s book, Grit.
item.content:encoded: Powering through things we don’t want to do. That’s what Angela Duckworth helps us do with this week’s book, Grit.

item.title: 3: A Pair of Tirades
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Raising kids is hard. And sometimes a bad experience for your child invokes a guttural and passionate response by the parent. Thus, Josh’s tirades.
item.content:encoded: Raising kids is hard. And sometimes a bad experience for your child invokes a guttural and passionate response by the parent. Thus, Josh’s tirades.

item.title: 2: The Math Show
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Joe had to (almost) double his development rates. Josh keeps trying to do math. It doesn’t go as well as expected.
item.content:encoded: Joe had to (almost) double his development rates. Josh keeps trying to do math. It doesn’t go as well as expected.

item.title: 1: A Good Goat Trail
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Joe has not seen Star Wars. Josh likes to make bacon. And somehow in the midst of diversions, they manage to discuss their goals for the next 12 weeks.
item.content:encoded: Joe has not seen Star Wars. Josh likes to make bacon. And somehow in the midst of diversions, they manage to discuss their goals for the next 12 weeks.

item.title: 24: Step by Chris Capehart (with Chris Capehart)
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: This week we’re joined by the author himself, Chris Capehart, to discuss his book Step and the impact a single action forward can have on your dreams.
item.content:encoded: This week we’re joined by the author himself, Chris Capehart, to discuss his book Step and the impact a single action forward can have on your dreams.

item.title: 23: Rhinoceros Success by Scott Alexander
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Let’s be rhinos! It’s an interesting concept and this round Mike and Joe discuss the implications of becoming a 6,000 lb rhinoceros.
item.content:encoded: Let’s be rhinos! It’s an interesting concept and this round Mike and Joe discuss the implications of becoming a 6,000 lb rhinoceros.

item.title: 22: The 10X Rule by Grant Cardone (with Shawn Blanc)
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: This round Mike and Joe are joined by Shawn Blanc to talk about taking massive action with The 10X Rule.
item.content:encoded: This round Mike and Joe are joined by Shawn Blanc to talk about taking massive action with The 10X Rule.

item.title: 21: The Personal MBA by Josh Kaufman
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Let’s get an MBA (unofficial) without the big price tag. There are a lot of gems here but the format got under Joe’s skin.
item.content:encoded: Let’s get an MBA (unofficial) without the big price tag. There are a lot of gems here but the format got under Joe’s skin.

item.title: 20: Who Moved My Cheese? by Spencer Johnson
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Mike dives head-first into the world of internet-connected light-bulbs. Joe doesn’t get it. And yet they both explore the world of moving cheese together.
item.content:encoded: Mike dives head-first into the world of internet-connected light-bulbs. Joe doesn’t get it. And yet they both explore the world of moving cheese together.

item.title: 19: The Shallows by Nicholas Carr
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: Does the use of internet devices change our brains? And if so, is it worth doing anything about? It’s a tough topic but Mike and Joe work their way through it.
item.content:encoded: Does the use of internet devices change our brains? And if so, is it worth doing anything about? It’s a tough topic but Mike and Joe work their way through it.

item.title: 18: Decisive by Chip Heath, Dan Heath
item.dc:creator: joe_buhlig
item.description: A new baby, a continuing morning phone addiction, and learning how to make better decisions. It’s all covered in this week’s episode.
item.content:encoded: A new baby, a continuing morning phone addiction, and learning how to make better decisions. It’s all covered in this week’s episode.
